title: Weeping Willows
description: Vada May Larson is on her way home to Louisiana after the death of her abusive boyfriend of fifteen years. She has bought an old farm house that she has only seen online. Will the house bring her heartache or be the house of her dreams? In the process of working on the house, she bonds with two special women in her life. Will they help her heal, or will she be the reason that they finally heal? While she is bonding with these special women, in walks Luke Dupre. Luke is the local handyman and he is gorgeous to say the least. Will she open her heart and take a chance on love, or will the past abuse in her life keep her from opening her heart?
author: Nancy   Baker
